item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Obrital - Optical Delusion - Dolby Atmos [E-AC-3 JOC 768kbps 16bit/48kHz]
item.description:
Orbital - Optical Delusion

Released: 17 February 2023
Genre: Dance, Electronic
Source: Apple Music Rip



I requested this along with a few other albums and while waiting i managed to teach myself how to rip apple music in atmos and decided to give back to the community which helped me find a few albums in atmos i could not rip myself from tidal or find on soulseek. Cheers to sharing!

I am familiar with Orbitals older work and once i seen they had a made a new album released in atmos i had to give it a chance. I have not kept up with the band honestly and from what i read they were not making music near the quality of their peak period, perhaps until this album which i read is one of their best in many years. Likely there best album in a long time.

This album has an actual blu ray audio release with a lossless dolby atmos soundtrack that would be lovely if someone could share the full bluray, or even a rip of the atmos or truehd track.

I am going to give the album a listen to later as i now have a lot of stuff to grab from apple and listen to.

Hope you all enjoy
